Review: Visited Relay store, good offers and very helpful customer service from Sreehari üëç
Its a nice place to pass your time while waiting for the flight, the staff and food is nice.

This has been more like a hang out place and I've visited here more than the times I've traveled out of this airport. They have a lovely ambience and open mall sort of set up outside the terminal area. I visit this store here "The Gourmet Food" pretty often. They have some amazing stuff, excellent quality, well priced and great staffs.. do take some time to visit their store in case you transit through KIAL. Apart from that, they got Sub Way, nice other eateries.. lot of options. Definitely worth to spent an evening adding to the drive on traffic free stretch to the airport itself.
Tasty food and polite staff. Ambience is just how we prefer for relaxing
BLR domestic lounge is living upto its expectations. Good clean and hygienic with plenty of choice on the platter. Staff is courteous and polite. Nice place to catch a quick grab on the go.

Well maintained airport, good ambience, big parking facilities. I recommend this store, Gourmet Food, just off the terminal building. Place has lot of unique items, excellent quality, helpful staffers. Must visit if you are fan of international chocolate brands.
nice ambience , very good staff

Lounge is clean and hygienic!

Service is excellent. Faciltity is clean and hygienic. Staff maintened proper social distancing and safe measures. Quality of food is good.
Fossil store at the airport was too good, staff was really good. They gave me a really good deal for the products I purchased. Thanks a lot to all.
